AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organizations of the Client with user acces rights
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (@AD_Client_ID@='0' AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID='0') OR (@AD_Client_ID@!='0' AND ((AD_Org.AD_Client_ID IN (@#User_Client@) AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID IN (@#User_Org@)) OR AD_Org.AD_Org_ID='0' AND AD_Org.IsSummary='N'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR/AP Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI', 'API','ARC','APC') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Material Shipments/Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Material Shipments and Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('MMR', 'MMS') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' AND (COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn OR COALESCE(@isDocumentTypeWindow@, 'N') = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR Pro Forma Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR Pro Forma Invoice

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_PriceList Base
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Base Pricelists need to have same currency

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType PO/SO
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SOO', 'POO') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' OR COALESCE(@AD_Org_ID@,'-1')='-1') AND COALESCE(@isReturnMaterial@, 'N') = C_DocType.IsReturn

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order SO to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: IsSOTrx='Y' AND DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND ((InvoiceRule = 'O' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyDelivered) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced AND QtyDelivered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'I' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner w SO to invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: BPartners with invoices to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT C_BPartner_ID FROM c_order WHERE IsSOTrx='Y' AND DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND ((InvoiceRule = 'O' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyDelivered) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced AND QtyDelivered <> QtyInvoiced)) OR (InvoiceRule = 'I' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced))))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='AC' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U1' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U2' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Payment not in BankStatement
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BankStatementLine l WHERE l.C_Payment_ID=C_Payment.C_Payment_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - Internal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND (bp.IsEmployee='Y' OR bp.IsSalesRep='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOut Receipts of Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (M_InOut.C_Project_ID IS NULL OR M_InOut.C_Project_ID=@C_Project_ID@) AND M_InOut.Processed='Y' AND M_InOut.IsSOTrx='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project based on status and bpartner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.projectstatus in ('OP', 'OR') and (C_Project.c_bpartner_id=@C_BPartner_ID@ or '@IsSOTrx@'='N') or C_Project.c_project_id = @c_project_id@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Sequence in process plan
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: MA_Sequence.MA_Processplan_Version_ID IN (SELECT MA_Processplan_Version_ID FROM MA_Processplan_Version WHERE MA_Processplan_Id=@MA_Processplan_ID@ AND datefrom <= TO_DATE(@Launchdate@) and dateto>TO_DATE(@Launchdate@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period_ID of selected year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID IN (SELECT C_Budget.C_Year_ID FROM C_Budget WHERE C_Budget.C_Budget_ID = @C_Budget_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: S_Expense product type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: PRODUCTTYPE = (CASE WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@ IS NULL THEN 'E' WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@='Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'E' END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org forced
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter by a defined Organization as an input AD_Org_Forced

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Machine not included
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only lets choose machines not inlcuded on the table.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MA_MachineStation ms WHERE ms.MA_WorkStation_ID = @MA_WorkStation_ID@ AND ms.MA_Machine_ID = MA_Machine.MA_Machine_ID )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Uom not as product_uom
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_Product_UOM pu WHERE pu.M_Product_ID = @M_Product_ID@ AND pu.C_UOM_ID = td0.C_UOM_ID AND pu.M_Product_UOM_ID <>@M_Product_UOM_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User Alert
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restrict users to role in alerts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User.AD_User_ID in (select AD_User_ID from AD_User_Roles where @AD_Role_Id@=AD_Role_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Role_of_User
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM AD_USER_ROLES A_U_R WHERE A_U_R.AD_ROLE_ID = AD_Role.AD_Role_ID AND A_U_R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_U_R.AD_USER_ID = @AD_User_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Client of Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_CLIENT.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS WHERE AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.AD_CLIENT_ID = AD_CLIENT.AD_CLIENT_ID AND AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.AD_ROLE_ID = @Default_AD_Role_ID@ AND AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS.ISACTIVE = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org of a Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS A_R_O, ad_role r WHERE A_R_O.AD_ORG_ID = AD_ORG.AD_Org_ID AND A_R_O.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = R.AD_ROLE_ID and r.ad_role_id = @Default_AD_Role_ID@ AND R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND (LPAD(TO_CHAR(R.USERLEVEL), 1, '1')='S' OR AD_ORG.AD_ORG_ID <> '0') AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = @Default_AD_Role_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Not discarded toolsets in Work Effort
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validation to filter the toolset by their type and status
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: MA_Toolset.Discarded = 'N' AND MA_Toolset.MA_Toolset_Type_ID IN (SELECT MA_Toolset_Type_ID FROM MA_ToolsetProcess, MA_WRPhase, M_ProductionPlan WHERE M_ProductionPlan.M_ProductionPlan_ID = @M_ProductionPlan_ID@ AND M_ProductionPlan.MA_WRPhase_ID = MA_WRPhase.MA_WRPhase_ID AND MA_WRPhase.MA_Process_ID = MA_ToolsetProcess.MA_Process_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Rules for POS Sales orders
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters the possible Invoice Rules whein is selected the POS Sales order document.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Current acctschema
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT WHERE C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.ELEMENTTYPE='AC' AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_ELEMENT_ID=C_ELEMENTVALUE.C_ELEMENT_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_Acctschema_ID=@C_Acctschema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_ImpFormat combo validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restricts copying lines of a File Format to itself

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_TAX - C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_LINES
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_TAX.SOPOTYPE<>(SELECT CASE WHEN ISSOTRX='Y' THEN 'P' ELSE 'S' END FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocBaseType - Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DOCTYPE.DOCBASETYPE IN ('ARI', 'ARC', 'API', 'APC') AND C_DOCTYPE.ISSOTRX = (SELECT ISSOTRX FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Currency of PriceList
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Sets the currency of the pricelist
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Currency.C_Currency_ID IN (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM M_Pricelist WHERE ISACTIVE='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_Table DocBaseType
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Doc base type of the selected document
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: Value IN (SELECT DOCBASETYPE FROM C_DOCTYPE, C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE WHERE C_DOCTYPE.AD_TABLE_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE.AD_TABLE_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE.C_ACCTSCHEMA_TABLE_ID = @C_Acctschema_Table_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Tax IsSOTrx
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Validate tax depending on is Sales or Purchase transaction
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE =(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'P' END) OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@ AND C_TAX.C_TAX_ID=(CASE WHEN @IsSOTrx@ = 'Y' AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) THEN (SELECT C_TAX_ID FROM AD_ORGINFO WHERE ISTAXUNDEDUCTABLE='Y' AND AD_ORG_ID=@AD_ORG_ID@) ELSE C_TAX.C_TAX_ID END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Business Partner Withholding
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Show the Withholdings which belong to the Business Partner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_BP_Withholding w , C_BPartner b WHERE w.C_BPartner_ID=b.C_BPartner_ID AND w.C_Withholding_ID=C_Withholding.C_Withholding_ID AND W.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccount
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_OrgType_BU_LE
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only Business Units or Legal Entities are displayed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: exists (select 1 from ad_orgtype where ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id = ad_org.ad_orgtype_id and (islegalentity='Y' or isbusinessunit='Y')) AND IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocType Not A Credit Memo
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: DocType that is not a Credit Memo

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org show child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It only shows the child organizations of the organization's header

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Financial Invoices GL Items
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It is allowing only gl items that have enabled for financial invoice lines.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Invoice Terms used in Orders Awaiting Invoice report
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Invoice Terms used in the Orders Awaiting Invoice report,with Do Not Invoice value removed.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Package_ID IsInDevelopment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_module_id in (select ad_module_id from ad_module where IsInDevelopment = 'Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Payment status for transactons
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Payment status used as transaction status in financila account

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema - Schemas matching parent organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA WHERE AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org any table by parent organization
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter a drop down to show only records of the organization or of parent organizations, based on the organization of the record that it is being edited.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_DataSet_Table access level
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters tables removing views and taking into account access level
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: ad_table.isView='N' and ((ad_table.accesslevel in ('3','1','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '1')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('4','6','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '4')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('6','3','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '6')) OR (ad_table.accesslevel in ('3','7') and exists(select 1 from ad_dataset where ad_dataset_id = @AD_DATASET_ID@ and ad_dataset.accesslevel = '3')) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Return reason RFC/RTV
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_RETURN_REASON.ISRFC = @ISSOTRX@ OR C_RETURN_REASON.ISRTV=(case when @ISSOTRX@='N' then 'Y' else 'N' end)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Status - Exclude In Remittance
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Excludes in remittance option for Create from bank popup

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: SalesTaxExemptRate
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'S' OR C_TAX.SOPOTYPE = 'B') AND C_TAX.ISTAXEXEMPT = 'Y' AND C_TAX.AD_CLIENT_ID=@AD_CLIENT_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType - Payment Proposal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('APPP', 'ARRP') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@FIN_Isreceipt@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@,C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, @#AD_Client_ID@) <> '-1' AND C_DocType.AD_Client_ID=@#AD_Client_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_Payment Status validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter status in sales and purchase.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (((@Isreceipt@='Y') AND Value not IN ('PPM','PWNC')) OR ((@Isreceipt@='N') AND Value not IN ('RPR','RDNC')))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org IsPeriodControlAllowed
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Display the organizations which are allowed to open/close period control

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - login users
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: AD_User with username not empty (login users)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Calendar and C_Year of an organization
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: It ensures the calendar combobox shows always the calendar of the selected organization
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_YEAR.C_CALENDAR_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT(C_CALENDAR_ID) FROM AD_ORG WHERE AD_ORG_ID=AD_ORG_GETCALENDAROWNER(@AD_ORG_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Price List isSOTrx
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: This validation forces the field to show only the type of pricelist that suits to the window, concerning wether it is a sales or a purchase window.

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Currency of Financial Account
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: c_currency.c_currency_id in (select c_currency_id from fin_financial_account where fin_financial_account_id = @FIN_Financial_Account_ID@) OR exists (select 1 from fin_finacc_paymentmethod where fin_financial_account_id = @FIN_Financial_Account_ID@ and fin_paymentmethod_id = @FIN_PaymentMethod_ID@ and isactive='Y' and ( (@IsReceipt@ = 'Y' and payin_allow ='Y' and payin_ismulticurrency='Y') OR (@IsReceipt@ = 'N' and payout_allow ='Y' and payout_ismulticurrency='Y') ))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Language_System
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: List of the Openbravo ERP System Languages

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org is transactions allowed
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Display the ready organizations where transactions are allowed
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ad_orgtype WHERE ad_orgtype.ad_orgtype_id=ad_org.ad_orgtype_id AND IsTransactionsAllowed='Y') and IsReady='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccountIsSOTrxControl
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account taking in account payment in / out allowed flags
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE FIN_PaymentMethod.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID=fapm.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID AND fapm.Payin_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@IsSOTrx@'='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payin_Allow END FROM DUAL) AND fapm.Payout_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@IsSOTrx@'='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payout_Allow END FROM DUAL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: FIN_PaymentMethodsWithAccountIsReceiptControl
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filters only the payment methods that belong to a financial account taking in account payment in / out allowed flags
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FIN_FinAcc_PaymentMethod fapm WHERE FIN_PaymentMethod.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID=fapm.FIN_PaymentMethod_ID AND fapm.Payin_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payin_Allow END FROM DUAL) AND fapm.Payout_Allow = (SELECT CASE WHEN '@FIN_ISRECEIPT@'='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE fapm.Payout_Allow END FROM DUAL))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_AcctSchema - Schemas matching parent & child organizations
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA WHERE AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = C_ACCTSCHEMA.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(@AD_Org_ID@, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1 OR AD_ISORGINCLUDED(AD_Org_ID, @AD_Org_ID@, AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Document currency
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Currency.C_Currency_id = CASE WHEN @C_Invoice_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM C_Invoice WHERE C_Invoice_ID = COALESCE(@C_Invoice_ID@,'---')) WHEN @APRM_Finacc_Transaction_V_ID@ is not null THEN (SELECT c_currency_id FROM aprm_finacc_transaction_v WHERE aprm_finacc_transaction_v_id = COALESCE(@APRM_Finacc_Transaction_V_ID@, '---')) ELSE (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM FIN_Payment WHERE FIN_Payment_ID = COALESCE(@FIN_Payment_ID@, '---')) END

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Product_Category in Product Sequence Orgs
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_ISORGINCLUDED(M_Product_Category.ad_org_id, (SELECT M_PRODUCT.AD_ORG_ID FROM MA_SEQUENCEPRODUCT LEFT JOIN M_PRODUCT ON MA_SEQUENCEPRODUCT.M_PRODUCT_ID = M_PRODUCT.M_PRODUCT_ID WHERE MA_SEQUENCEPRODUCT_ID = @MA_SEQUENCEPRODUCT_ID@ ), M_Product_Category.ad_client_id)<>-1
